LanguageData.Make_Kevlar.label: make kevlar
LanguageData.Make_Kevlar.description:
Make kevlar sheets from kevlar fibers.
Makes 20 sheets of kevlar.
LanguageData.Make_KevlarFromChemfuel.label: make kevlar fibers from chemfuel
LanguageData.Make_KevlarFromChemfuel.description: Produce the basic fibers from which Kevlar is made.
